duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for the day-to-day operations of the clinic, including patient care, personnel management, physician relations, and financial management.
Provide clinical mentorship and leadership in outpatient orthopedic clinic settings.
Direct diverse clinical programs, lead clinical education programming, participate in national recruiting strategy, and contribute to events and promotions.
Promote the pursuit of clinical excellence, teaching, and learning within the culture of the clinic.
Ensure one-on-one patient care, no double-booking of appointments, and the treatment of each patient by a licensed rehabilitation professional at every visit.

education_certification.credential: Degree in Physical Therapy from a Commission on Accreditation in Physical Therapy Education accredited institution. Current State Physical Therapist License, CPR certification.
